title: Login and Signup form
description: The project is a web based application that allows users to create accounts,login, and has a forgot password link for account recovery

title: Weather App
description: The app offers real-time data about the current weather information for a specific or multiple locations.

title: Image Search App
description: Allows users to enter search queries for images, it shows the list of images that match the search query and displays images in a visually appealing manner.
